pronunciation: TRIBULA'TION [Latin tribulo, to thrash, to beat.]

definition.text: Severe affliction; distresses of life; vexations. In Scripture, it often denotes the troubles and distresses which proceed from persecution.When tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word, he is offended. Matthew 1 3:2 1.In the world ye shall have tribulation John 1 6:33.
